name: Koko 'n Dillo
description:
Use the duality of our two protagonists to watch each others' backs! Manage controlling two characters at once: Koko picks up loot while Dillo rolls in and defends. Explore arid temples and defend against enemies, collecting as much loot as possible on your way to escape to the docks!

Created in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022.

Controller & Keyboard supported (hypothetically, and the controller maybe not on menus.)

Keyboard:

WASD: Move Dillo
Arrow keys: Move Koko
LShift: Shoot
RShift: Hoover loot

Controller:

Left joystick: Move Dillo
Right joystick: Move Koko
Left trigger: Shoot
Right trigger: Hoover loot
